text: Kelly Xu (born March 11, 1995) is a Chinese business executive and economist. Xu founded the Ono in 2017, and also known as "the First Blockchain Social Network" in China. ==Early life and education== Kelly Xu was born in Nanjing, Jiangsu, China. Xu attended Nanjing Foreign Language School before moving to the United States at the age of 14 to study at Montverde Academy. As an exchange student at the University of Riverside, California, in 2013, and she received her Master of Economics and Global Business at University College London. ==Career== Since 2014, Xu started blockchain entrepreneurship, and she founded Nome Lab In 2016. In 2017, Kelly Xu Founded the ONO, which obtain financing from KIP and Grand Shores in 2018. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people
title: Kelly Xu
